name: Come Try Genius Invokation TCG!
desc: Someone in Mondstadt's alchemy store seems to be talking about a strange package they received recently. Go check it out.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Unlock Requirements</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Reach Adventure Rank 30</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Archon Quest "Prologue: Act III - Song of the Dragon and Freedom"</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Chain</color>
<color=#ffffff73>World Quest Series:</color>

customize.name: Come Try Genius Invokation TCG!
customize.desc: Someone in Mondstadt's alchemy store seems to be talking about a strange package they received recently. Go check it out.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Beginner Player Badge
customize.desc:
They say that anyone who starts out with Genius Invokation TCG can obtain this particular Player Badge.

Even the mightiest player starts from this point, building their personal legends as they go along.

Stay tuned, player — your saga begins here!

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff73>Go to</color> <color=#ece5d8>Mondstadt</color> <color=#ffffff73>'s alchemy store</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Go to</color> <color=#ece5d8>The Cat's Tail</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Talk to</color>

customize.name: Margaret
customize.desc: The owner of Cat's Tail. Despite her charming and witty humor in both promotional and casual talks, she admits that the tavern's recent increase in popularity is due to Diona's mixology.

customize.text: <color=#ffffff73>Go to the empty table to learn the rules from</color>

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff73>Learn the rules from Diona</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Talk to Diona</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Have a Genius Invokation TCG duel with</color>

customize.name: Sucrose
customize.desc: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

customize.name: Shuyun
customize.desc: Works at The Cat's Tail. He helps translate what Prince and the other cats are saying.

customize.name: Margaret
customize.desc: The owner of Cat's Tail. Despite her charming and witty humor in both promotional and casual talks, she admits that the tavern's recent increase in popularity is due to Diona's mixology.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff73>and Claim the Casket of Tomes</color>

customize.name: Swan
customize.desc: A member of the Knights of Favonius. He can often be found standing guard at the entrance of Mondstadt city.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

customize.desc: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

customize.name: Diluc
customize.desc: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

customize.name: Timaeus
customize.desc: A Mondstadter who studies alchemy and seeks to educate others about alchemy's value.

customize.name: Margaret
customize.desc: The owner of Cat's Tail. Despite her charming and witty humor in both promotional and casual talks, she admits that the tavern's recent increase in popularity is due to Diona's mixology.

customize.name: Prince
customize.desc: Prince is Margaret's cat and is also a Genius Invokation TCG Master at the Cat's Tail Tavern.

customize.name: Shuyun
customize.desc: Works at The Cat's Tail. He helps translate what Prince and the other cats are saying.

customize.name: Swan
customize.desc: A member of the Knights of Favonius. He can often be found standing guard at the entrance of Mondstadt city.

customize.name: Casket of Tomes
customize.desc:
A box for cards released by the Genius Invokation TCG Society.

Only beginners who have learned the basic rules and are verified as players can collect one.

They say that these boxes were made by researchers from the Sumeru Akademiya, and that they feature a special mechanism that can be used to detect nearby people who also possess Caskets of Tomes.

Use this function to engage in more matches against nearby players!

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc:
"Fischl, Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" Fischl

"Oz, mine familiar, spread thine wings and weave for me a new fate in the gloom of this night!"

"Mein Fräulein, you cannot expect me to fetch you a replacement card…"
